content.description: Directions: The question or incomplete statement below is followed by four suggested answers or completions. Select the one that is best in each case.
content.question: Which of the following is a true statement about program documentation?

choices.label: Program documentation should not be changed after it is first written.
Program documentation is only needed for programs in development; it is not needed after a program is completed.
Program documentation is useful when programmers collaborate but not when a programmer works individually on a project.
Program documentation is useful during initial program development and also when modifications are made to existing programs.

content.answer: Program documentation is useful during initial program development and also when modifications are made to existing programs.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a code segment or program functions.
